sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_240028_hikon_tasks"> <x_240028_hikon_tasks action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <acceptance_criteria>When a user from the same comapny logs into ServiceNow, the Additional comment field is visable and he can add comments</acceptance_criteria> <active>true</active> <actual_hours>1970-01-01 01:00:00</actual_hours> <approval>approved</approval> <assigned_to display_value="Lewis Murrell">ae97913e4f6ca3007e72aa95d310c768</assigned_to> <assignment_group display_value="BrightStarr" name="BrightStarr">2b33a4124fa463007e72aa95d310c7c7</assignment_group> <category display_value="System">c1ad05924f2863007e72aa95d310c75f</category> <company display_value="BrightStarr">c507ddfa4f6ca3007e72aa95d310c79b</company> <description>When a user from the same company, view an incident that was raised by a peer - he should be able to add comments</description> <estimated_hours>1970-01-01 01:00:00</estimated_hours> <estimated_hours_sp>1970-01-01 01:00:00</estimated_hours_sp> <notes/> <number>TAS0001224</number> <package display_value="PACK0001018">b395341f4f6027007e72aa95d310c7fc</package> <short_description>ACL - Allow additional comments by Comapny members</short_description> <solution_description/> <state>testing</state> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-10-26 16:23:37</sys_created_on> <sys_id>8fc3928f4f5d67007e72aa95d310c743</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-10-26 16:23:56</sys_updated_on> <task_watch_list/> <update_set_name>Hikon - Fix Comments ACL</update_set_name> </x_240028_hikon_tasks> </record_update>
